verses.name: Revelation 13:13
verses.text: And he doeth great wonders, so that he maketh fire come down from heaven on the earth in the sight of men,

verses.name: Revelation 13:14
verses.text: And deceiveth them that dwell on the earth by the means of those miracles which he had power to do in the sight of the beast; saying to them that dwell on the earth, that they should make an image to the beast, which had the wound by a sword, and did live.
